alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:28AM EST until January 21 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the most persistent lake snows along the Chautauqua Ridge, with 2 to 4 inches elsewhere. Northwest winds gusting up to 25 mph will produce some limited blowing snow this afternoon and evening. * WHERE...Chautauqua county. Greatest accumulations will be along the Chautauqua Ridge. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. The heaviest snow is expected to be this afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult with snow covered roads and poor visibility. The greater travel impacts are expected this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
